tickets.title: Can't reset password
tickets.description: Customer reports that the password reset email never arrives. They have checked spam folder and waited 30 minutes. This is affecting their ability to access their account for an important deadline.

activity.content: Customer called in - very frustrated. Urgent issue.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Billing discrepancy on invoice #4521
tickets.description: Customer was charged twice for their monthly subscription. They are requesting a refund for the duplicate charge of $299.

activity.content: Escalated to finance team for review.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Feature request: Dark mode
tickets.description: Multiple users have requested a dark mode option for the dashboard. This would help reduce eye strain during long work sessions.

activity.content: Added to product backlog for Q1 2026 consideration.
activity.author: Emily Watson

tickets.title: API rate limiting errors
tickets.description: Customer's integration is hitting rate limits unexpectedly. They claim their usage is within the documented limits. Need to investigate their API key usage patterns.

activity.content: Checking API logs for anomalies.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Login page not loading on Safari
tickets.description: Users on Safari 17.x report that the login page shows a blank white screen. Works fine on Chrome and Firefox. Console shows JavaScript errors.

activity.content: Reproduced the issue. Sending to dev team.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Export to CSV not working
tickets.description: The 'Export to CSV' button in the reports section does nothing when clicked. No download starts and no error message appears.

activity.content: Fixed in release v2.4.1. Customer confirmed working.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Need to update company name
tickets.description: Our company recently rebranded from 'Old Corp' to 'New Innovations LLC'. Please update our account name across all systems.

activity.content: Account name updated successfully.
activity.author: Emily Watson

tickets.title: Two-factor authentication not sending codes
tickets.description: Customer cannot receive 2FA codes via SMS. They have verified their phone number is correct. This is blocking them from accessing their admin account.

activity.content: Checking SMS gateway status. May be a provider issue.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Slow dashboard loading times
tickets.description: Dashboard takes 15+ seconds to load. This started happening after the last update. Performance was fine before.

activity.content: Performance team is investigating. May be related to new analytics widget.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Webhook deliveries failing
tickets.description: Our webhook endpoint is not receiving any events since yesterday. We need this for our automated workflow. Endpoint URL: https://api.example.com/webhooks

activity.content: Investigating webhook delivery logs.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Mobile app crashes on startup
tickets.description: iOS app version 3.2.0 crashes immediately after splash screen on iPhone 14 Pro. Android version works fine.

activity.content: Crash logs received. Appears to be a memory issue with new iOS 17.2.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Request for API documentation
tickets.description: We're planning to build an integration and need comprehensive API documentation. Is there a developer portal we can access?

activity.content: Sent link to developer portal: https://docs.example.com/api
activity.author: Emily Watson

tickets.title: SSO integration not working with Okta
tickets.description: SAML SSO integration with Okta fails during authentication. Error: 'Invalid signature'. We followed the setup guide exactly.

activity.content: Requested SAML metadata file from customer for review.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Data import failing for large files
tickets.description: Trying to import a CSV with 50,000 rows. Import starts but fails at around 30% with a timeout error. Smaller files work fine.

activity.content: Suggested breaking file into smaller chunks as workaround.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Email notifications not being received
tickets.description: Team members are not receiving email notifications for new assignments. Notification settings are all enabled. Started 3 days ago.

activity.content: Checking email delivery service logs.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Incorrect timezone in reports
tickets.description: All timestamps in generated reports show UTC instead of our local timezone (PST). This is causing confusion in our team.

activity.content: Guided customer to timezone settings in account preferences.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Cannot delete old projects
tickets.description: The delete button for archived projects is grayed out. We need to remove old projects to clean up our workspace.

activity.content: This is by design - archived projects must be unarchived first. Added to documentation todo.
activity.author: Emily Watson

tickets.title: Search function returns no results
tickets.description: Global search in the app returns 'No results found' for everything, even items we know exist. This worked fine last week.

activity.content: Search index may need rebuilding. Escalating to backend team.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Custom fields not saving
tickets.description: When we add custom fields to our project template, they don't persist after saving. The fields disappear on page refresh.

activity.content: Bug confirmed. Dev team working on fix for next release.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Upgrade plan inquiry
tickets.description: We're interested in upgrading from Professional to Enterprise plan. Can someone explain the differences and pricing?

activity.content: Connected customer with sales team. Meeting scheduled.
activity.author: Emily Watson

tickets.title: File upload size limit too small
tickets.description: We need to upload design files that are 50MB+ but the current limit is 25MB. Is there a way to increase this?

activity.content: Limit increase available on Enterprise plan. Forwarded pricing info.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Calendar sync with Google Calendar broken
tickets.description: Events created in the app are not syncing to Google Calendar anymore. Re-authorization doesn't help. Was working until yesterday.

activity.content: Investigating Google API changes. May be related to their recent update.
activity.author: Alex Kim

tickets.title: Cannot change user permissions
tickets.description: As admin, I cannot modify permissions for team members. The save button does nothing. Getting console errors.

activity.content: Reproduced issue. Frontend bug in permissions module.
activity.author: Mike Johnson

tickets.title: Print view cuts off content
tickets.description: When printing reports, the right side of tables gets cut off. Page margins seem to be ignored.

activity.content: Workaround: Use landscape orientation. Fix planned for v2.5.
activity.author: Sarah Chen

tickets.title: Duplicate entries appearing in dropdown
tickets.description: The client selection dropdown shows some clients multiple times. This is confusing our sales team when creating new entries.

activity.content: Database has duplicate records. Need to run cleanup script.
activity.author: Alex Kim
